channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Eligible Celsius users can withdraw all 'Distributable Custody Assets' following court approval
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Certain Celsius users, largely those who only ever held funds in custody accounts, had previously been limited to withdrawing up to 94% of their funds.

item.title: Argentina's central bank halts cryptocurrencies from payment apps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The ban is intended to reduce Argentina's payment-system exposure to digital assets, said the monetary authority.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Hyperinflation and Bitcoin wagers, AI replacing first jobs and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores the latest wild wager on Bitcoin prices, inflation fears and the jobs that artificial intelligence may soon replace.

item.title: Liquid staking solutions now have more TVL than DEXs: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: April was a month of hacks, exploits and rug pulls, resulting in over $100 million in net losses across DeFi platforms.

item.title: RFK Jr. elaborates position on CBDC, crypto: ‘It isn’t just criminals who want privacy’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The U.S. presidential candidate has added anti-CBDC to his anti-establishment, anti-vaccination repertoire and has gained double-digit support among Democrats.

item.title: Artists face a choice with AI: Adapt or become obsolete
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hector Ferran
item.description: Art generated by artificial intelligence is making waves because of its ramifications — for originality, authorship, and authenticity.

item.title: Tim Cook says Apple will weave AI into products as researchers work on solving bias
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The Apple CEO said the company would “continue weaving” AI into its products as internal research indicates an emphasis on building unbiased AI systems.

item.title: BNP Paribas teams up with Bank of China to promote digital yuan usage
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The partnership will enable BNP Paribas China’s corporate clients to make payments using the digital yuan through an e-CNY management system.

item.title: Prosecutor says Do Kwon’s extradition to South Korea would best serve Terraform Labs’ victims: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The former Terraform Labs CEO could face 40 years in jail in South Korea, the country where he committed most of his crimes, according to local authorities.

item.title: PacWest Bank plummets 50%! How will Bitcoin react?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how PacWest’s plummeting share price and the continued banking crisis could impact Bitcoin.

item.title: UK financial watchdog announces inspections against sites with suspected illegal crypto ATMs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The FCA’s actions followed similar operations in East London and Leeds, where the regulator said it had issued warnings or cease-and-desist requests to suspected ATM operators.

item.title: Price analysis 5/5: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Ether has broken out of its triangle, and that may pull the Bitcoin price above $30,000.

item.title: Will AI talent marketplaces replace traditional employment models?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tayyub Yaqoob
item.description: Discover how AI talent marketplaces are transforming the job market and disrupting traditional employment models.

item.title: How can AI be used to improve credit scoring?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: AI can analyze data for accurate risk assessment, reduce bias, automate tasks and personalize the lending experience for improved credit scoring.

item.title: Will Biden's plan to tax crypto mining reduce emissions? Critics say no
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The tax is intended to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, electricity costs and local environmental pollution, but has not been kindly received by the crypto community.

item.title: New York AG’s office seeks additional authority over crypto firms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Under a bill proposed by New York Attorney General Letitia James, crypto exchanges could be required to reimburse users who were the victims of fraud.

item.title: Emerging tech to create “new ethics” for humankind: MEWS 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Stephen Castell commented that emerging technologies like blockchain, the metaverse and AI will usher in a new set of ethics and human species.

item.title: AI’s black box problem: Challenges and solutions for a transparent future
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: A look inside the AI black box problem: confronting the trust dilemma and unearthing strategies for transparent AI.

item.title: China’s crypto stance unchanged by moves in Hong Kong, says exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Crypto developments in Hong Kong do not mean China has softened or will soften its approach to regulating Bitcoin.

item.title: Should crypto be rebranded?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zain Jaffer
item.description: What people need to realize is that the technology of blockchain, and the shenanigans that some people pull, are two totally different things.

item.title: SUI price drops 70% from market debut top amid excessive supply concerns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The circulating supply of SUI tokens will grow by nearly 15% by the end of 2023.

item.title: Memecoin mania: Social relevance, speculation drives PEPE surge
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Memecoins are back in the headlines as PEPE booms, taking the market capitalization of speculative tokens over $20 billion.

item.title: PEPE memecoin hits $1 billion market cap fueled by Binance listing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The price of the new frog-themed memecoin has surged more than 4,000% since its inception on April 14.

item.title: How blockchains can solve greenwashing and contribute to climate action
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: BNB Chain’s Victor Genin said blockchain could improve transparency, accountability, traceability, energy efficiency, waste reduction and collaboration in the climate action space.

item.title: Memecoin hype drives Bitcoin transaction fees to multi-year highs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Despite the latest spike in Bitcoin transaction fees, the current BTC transaction cost is still far from all-time high levels.

item.title: White House to build international standards for DLT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The White House national strategy listed eight emerging technologies, focusing on building international standards and finding use cases in the economic sector.

item.title: Zimbabwe sets price to sell gold-backed digital tokens
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Zimbabwe’s central bank plans to sell gold-backed digital tokens at $10 for individuals and $5,000 for corporations.

item.title: Bitcoin price sets new May high above $29.5K as traders eye breakout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls slowly claw back lost ground on the road to a $30,000 rematch as the U.S. banking crisis lingers.

item.title: Google engineer concerned about open-source AI gaining edge
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: A leaked document from a senior software engineer sounds the alarm about Google’s artificial intelligence development.

item.title: What is profit and loss (PnL) and how to calculate it
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Dilip Kumar Patairya
item.description: PnL refers to the financial gain or loss from buying and selling cryptocurrencies. To calculate it, use various method like the FIFO, LIFO, YTD, and more!
